results.title: Sulfonylurea antidiabetics are associated with lower risk of out-of-hospital cardiac arrest: Real-world data from a population-based study
results.text_hl: We identified 2503 @DISEASE_Out_of_Hospital_Cardiac_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D058687 @@@OHCA@@@ cases from cardiac causes with ECG documented VT/@<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@VF@@@ and complete drug-dispensing records; among these cases, 219 used @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in monotherapy, SU drugs alone or SU drugs in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (mean age 71.4 years, 76.7% male, Table 1, Figure 1).

citations.NLM: Eroglu TE, Jia L, Blom MT, Verkerk AO, Devalla HD, Boink GJJ, Souverein PC, de Boer A, Tan HL. Sulfonylurea antidiabetics are associated with lower risk of out-of-hospital cardiac arrest: Real-world data from a population-based study Br J Clin Pharmacol. 2021 Sep;87(9):3588-3598. PMID: 33896015
citations.BibTeX: @article{33896015, title={Sulfonylurea antidiabetics are associated with lower risk of out-of-hospital cardiac arrest: Real-world data from a population-based study}, author={Eroglu TE and Jia L and Blom MT and Verkerk AO and Devalla HD and Boink GJJ and Souverein PC and de Boer A and Tan HL}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={87}, number={9}, pages={3588-3598}}

results.title: The efficacy of different insulin-sensitizing agents on treatment outcomes in patients with polycystic ovary syndrome who underwent in-vitro fertilization: A retrospective, record-based, comparative study.
results.text_hl: INTRODUCTION: It is not clear which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Inositol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007294 @@@inositol@@@ is more effective on @<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@IVF@@@ results.

citations.NLM: Yaylalı A, Bakacak M, Bakacak Z. The efficacy of different insulin-sensitizing agents on treatment outcomes in patients with polycystic ovary syndrome who underwent in-vitro fertilization: A retrospective, record-based, comparative study. J Gynecol Obstet Hum Reprod. 2021 Jan;50(1):102006. PMID: 33242676

results.title: Myoinositol versus metformin pretreatment in GnRH-antagonist cycle for women with PCOS undergoing IVF: a double-blinded randomized controlled study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Inositol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007294 @@@Myoinositol@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pretreatment in GnRH-antagonist cycle for @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ undergoing @<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@IVF@@@: a double-blinded randomized controlled study.

results.title: Association of insulin resistance with in vitro fertilization outcomes in women without polycystic ovarian syndrome: potential improvement with metformin treatment.
results.text_hl: The association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure and @<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@IVF@@@ outcomes among @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ was assessed as secondary outcomes.

results.title: Preconditioning and anti-apoptotic effects of Metformin and Cyclosporine-A in an isolated bile duct-ligated rat heart.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@CsA@@@ decreased and increased the @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ score and incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@VF@@@ in the BDL groups, respectively.

results.title: Metformin, clomiphene citrate and flutamide effects on oocyte ultrastructure status and quality in PCOS mouse model.
results.text_hl: The better IVM-@<m>DISEASE_Paroxysmal_ventricular_fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537182 @@@IVF@@@ outcomes were also observed in the @CHEMICAL_Clomiphene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002996 @@@clomiphene citrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ groups compared with the @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ group.
